Text: OFF Holiday Gift GuideDear Wine Enthusiast This past week we experienced technical difficulties with our email service and the email you received may not have functioned properly We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience We welcome you to come back and browse our wonderful holiday entertaining and gift collection with the added bonus of OFF until Please remember to use the code EA when ordering Thank you and happy holidays Visit us at UMTaspA Order online or call Use code EA at checkout THE ESSENTIALS FOR HOLIDAY ENTERTAINING GIFT GUIDE Plus OFF until HOLIDAY ENTERTAINING ESSENTIALS Click here UMTaspA ESSENTIALS FOR THE HOME BAR Martinis decanters shakers and much more Click here UMTaspA ONE OF A KIND GIFTS Monogram these wonderful items to add a personal touch Click here UMTaspA WINE LOOPS AND CHARMS FOR EVERY OCCASSION Click here UMTaspA DELECTABLE CULINARY DELIGHTS Click here UMTaspA COMPACT CELLARS ESSENTIAL FOR ENTERTAINING Click here UMTaspA This offer expires on and cannot be combined with any other offer You are receiving the email because you have subscribed to Enthusiast Essentials If you would like to remove yourself from this list please click UMUaspB and you will be removed immediately Thank you
